title: Irish Hunger Memorial (NYC) typeface
content:
I’m looking for the name of the typeface used in the Irish Hunger Memorial that’s located in Battery Park (New York City). I’ve attached a photo. The monument was designed by Brian Tolle, in collaboration with several architects.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [HungerMemorialNumber7.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905122503/http:/typophile.com/files/HungerMemorialNumber7.JPG) | 252.57 KB |

 [‹ BARON SERVICES Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905122503/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46934 "Go to previous forum topic") [Can anyone ID this sans-serif? And how would you classify it? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905122503/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46836 "Go to next forum topic")
author: csmitchy
